adDetails: Do you have tall grasses, brush, tall weeds or small trees on your lot, property or home? Do you have green waste piles or debri piles on your lot property or home? Has the Fire Dept. told you to make a DEFENSIBLE SPACE around your property? If you answered yes to any of these questions, you may need me to come in and make you that DEFENSIBLE SPACE. My Rough Cut Mower will go through pretty much anything. It can cut through the dense grasses, weeds, small trees up to 1 1/2 inches thick..I can make quick work of most anything..My Rough Cut Mower will cut everything down to 2 inches. It could slow a Fire down enough to help Fire Fighters possibly saving your Lot, Property or Home from burning.. I also do Weed Whacking and hauling green waste or debri piles. Lets get your Lot, Property or Home ready for Fire Season.. I am VERY SAFE, Hardworking and Dependable,, Very Affordable
